channel.title: 100 errors with this code? Whats wrong with it?

item.title: 100 errors with this code? Whats wrong with it?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

11 problems:

.\server\npcs\NPCHandler.java:596: class, interface, or enum expected
        public void dropItems(int i) {
               ^
.\server\npcs\NPCHandler.java:598: class, interface, or enum expected
                boolean stopRolling = false;
                ^
.\server\npcs\NPCHandler.java:599: class, interface, or enum expected
                client c = (client)server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].getKille
r()];
                ^
.\server\npcs\NPCHandler.java:600: class, interface, or enum expected
                if(c != null) {
                ^
.\server\npcs\NPCHandler.java:607: class, interface, or enum expected
                        for(npc = 0; npc < server.npcsdrops.drops.length; npc++)
{
                                     ^
.\server\npcs\NPCHandler.java:607: class, interface, or enum expected
                        for(npc = 0; npc < server.npcsdrops.drops.length; npc++)
{
                                                                          ^
.\server\npcs\NPCHandler.java:612: class, interface, or enum expected
                                                        if (server.npcsdrops.dro
ps[npc][3] > 1) {
                                                        ^
.\server\npcs\NPCHandler.java:614: class, interface, or enum expected
                                                        }
                                                        ^
.\server\npcs\NPCHandler.java:496: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable barrows
location: class server.npcs.NPC
                                        npcs[i].barrows += 1;
                                               ^
.\server\npcs\NPCHandler.java:557: cannot find symbol
symbol  : method dropItems(int)
location: class server.npcs.NPCHandler
                                                        dropItems(i); // npc dro
ps items!
                                                        ^
.\server\players\Player.java:1213: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable barrows
location: class server.players.Player
        barrows = 0;
        ^
Note: .\server\server.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
11 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

And the first error, it relates to the first line of the code I think.

Read full topic

item.title: 100 errors with this code? Whats wrong with it?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

         if(barrows == 6) {
			resetBarrows();
                        sM("Congratulations, you have completed the barrows minigame!");
			addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 1);
	}

100 errors. I tried adding an extra bracket but it didn’t work.
